alert.note: Alert for Rapides (Louisiana) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Lake Charles (Southeast Texas and Southwest Louisiana)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued December 14 at 12:14AM CST by NWS Lake Charles
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of southeastern Rapides Parish through 1245 AM CST... At 1214 AM CST, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm near Glenmora, moving northeast at 30 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 40 mph. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Locations impacted include... Glenmora, Cheneyville, Lecompte, Woodworth, Forest Hill and Mcnary. This includes Interstate 49 between mile markers 59 and 73. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. Frequent cloud to ground lightning is occurring with this storm. Lightning can strike 10 miles away from a thunderstorm. Seek a safe shelter inside a building or vehicle. A Tornado Watch remains in effect until 400 AM CST for central Louisiana.
